pages.text: §2Verdania, the Nature Guardian§r, responds to this sacred ritual of growth and harmony. The ritual channels the essence of life and natural cycles.$(br2)This ritual can be performed to gain favor with Verdania and may be required to complete divine tasks.
Place an §2Oak Sapling§r in the brazier as the ritual focus. Arrange the components on stone hands around the brazier, then activate with an §aEmerald§r.

pages.title: Ritual Components
pages.text: §lStone Hand Contents:§r$(br)• 4x §2Wheat Seeds§r - symbols of new life$(br)• 2x §aBone Meal§r - nourishment for growth$(br)• 2x §6Oak Log§r - connection to the forest$(br2)Light the brazier when all components are properly placed.
